Title: PATTERNS OF PROPAGATING BUGS IN OPEN SOURCE SOFTWARES
Elements_risk_assessment: each line of the hunk can be mapped with the lines of the previous revisions up to the first revision and can find the origin of this bug
UseOF-SZZ: Locate the origin of the bug
Summary:
to investigate the source code for identification of patterns of bugs that generally propagate in
software revisions
Outcome: errors propagate in different source files as well as in different releases of respective files in the project.
